lines.gurmukhi: jYsy guAwr gwien crwvq jqn bn; Kyq n prq sbY crq AGwie kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as cowherd grazer grazes his cows very attentively in the jungle and does not let them wander into some fields, and they graze to their satisfaction.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ guAwlw gweIAwˆ v`g nUM bn ivc crOˆdw hY; qy jqn krdw hY; jo iksy dy Kyq ivc nw pYx so ieauˆ hI swrIAwˆ r`j ky cr lYˆdIAwˆ hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy rwjw Drm srUp rwjnIq ibKY; qw ky dys prjw bsq suK pwie kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a king who is righteous and just, his subjects live in peace and prosperity.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ rwjw rwjnIqI ivKy Drm srUpI inAwˆeI rhy qwˆ Es dy dyS ivc prjw suK pUrbk visAw krdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy hoq Kyvt cyqMin swvDwn jw mY; lwgY inribGn bohQ pwir jwie kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a sailor is very alert and conscious of his duties, that ship touches the yonder shore without any adverse happenings.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ jw boihQ mY ijhVy boihQ, jhwj = byVy ivc Kyvt mlwh sÎwxw qy swvDwn hovy, auh inrivGn hI pwr jw phuMcdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur aunmn mgn bRhm joq; jIvn mukiq krY isK smJwie kY [418[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, the True Guru who has merged with the Light divine of the Lord, like warp and weft of a cloth, alone can make a disciple living emancipated with His teachings.  (418)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr hI siqgurU is`K nUM smJw smJw ky bRh mjoqI prmwqm pRkwS dw DÎwn Drw Drw aunmnI AvsQw ivKy mgn krOˆdy krOˆdy jIvn mukq bxw idAw krdy hn ]418]
